label: Service
comment: A service associated with a transport movement.,A referenced service associated with a specified event during transport movement.

datatypeProperties.comment: A contract identifier for this supply chain consignment.
A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.
Information, expressed as text, concerning the transport of these dangerous goods.
A name or symbol, expressed as text, of a radioactive radionuclide.
The indication of whether or not this referenced transport service has been planned in advance of its execution.
A code specifying a reason for the declared error.
A code specifying a contract movement type of this transport service.
A code specifying a type of category for this transport service.
A code specifying a type of condition for this transport service, such as a contract or carriage condition.
The code specifying the payment arrangement for this logistics service charge [Reference United Nations Code List (UNCL) 4237].
The code specifying the priority of this transport service.
A code specifying a service requirement for this transport service.

objectProperties.comment: An actual period of performance for this referenced transport service.
A monetary value of the calculated price to be charged.
A logistics location specified for a delivery by this referenced transport service.
The period within which this document line is effective.
An estimated period of performance for this referenced transport service.
A quantity of items for this referenced transport service.
A planned period of performance for this referenced transport service.
A related logistics location specified for this referenced transport service.
A requested period of performance for this referenced transport service.
A trade party requesting this referenced transport service.
A party responsible for providing this referenced transport service.
A transport route specified for this transport service.
A Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) communication for this trade party, such as a web or email address.

referencedBy.comment: A transport service for this supply chain consignment.
A transport service provided by this location party.
A transport service required for this logistics means of transport.
A requested service related to this transport event.
An excess transport service for this logistics transport movement.
